statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_phone, customer_name FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 4 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY customer_email DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_phone LIKE '123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND customer_phone LIKE '%555';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id > 2 AND (customer_phone LIKE '%123' OR customer_phone LIKE '456%');
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_amount FROM qr_codes ORDER BY qr_amount DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_expiry_date FROM qr_codes WHERE qr_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT qr_code_id, qr_amount FROM qr_codes WHERE qr_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY qr_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN qr_codes ON customers.customer_id = qr_codes.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, qr_amount, qr_expiry_date FROM customers INNER JOIN qr_codes ON customers.customer_id = qr_codes.customer_id WHERE qr_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(order_total) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, PaymentTransactions.payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN PaymentTransactions ON Orders.order_id = PaymentTransactions.order_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, order_total, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_total > 100;
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(order_total) AS total_spent FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT qr_code_description, valid_from, valid_to FROM qr_codes ORDER BY valid_from DESC;
SELECT log_id, verification_date FROM verification_logs WHERE verification_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY verification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT qr_code_description, valid_from, valid_to FROM qr_codes WHERE valid_to > NOW() ORDER BY valid_to ASC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, payments.amount FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE payment_status = true;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, payment_status FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_method, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT orders.total_amount, customers.name FROM orders INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id WHERE orders.payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM payments;
SELECT qr_codes.code, payment_history.status FROM qr_codes LEFT JOIN payment_history ON qr_codes.qr_id = payment_history.payment_id WHERE qr_codes.used = FALSE;
SELECT customers.name, payments.payment_method FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id;
